name: Do not feed the lion!
description:
My first published 'thing'. Uploaded for 'One Game a Month'

Prototype of the game made in a day for Unity Feast Game Jam. Needs more playability but it illustrates the idea. I will maybe work more on it if I have time.

You play as a hungry zoo lion who keeps getting treats from visitors, despite the obvious rule 'Do not feed the lion!'. You must catch the meat, not the sweets! Use the mouse to move.

Made in Unity using Free Asset Store assets.
